short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deletes 'ignored user' posts from the shoutbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: https://forums.bannister.org/ Allows logged in users to IGNORE other users but displays 'ignored user' in the chat widget. This extension eliminates the 'ignored user' comments, displaying a seamless chat experience while eliminating chats from all user(s) that have been ignored.
